name: Tarun Anand
bio: web hacker and coder with a strong background in cybersecurity. I specialize in finding and securing vulnerabilities, with a particular focus on web applications. My work has been recognized by organizations including NASA, the UK Government, the Dutch Government, and the Ministry of Defence UK.

google_cybersecurity_professional_certif.description: Certificate for entry-level cybersecurity roles, covering network security, risk management, and threat analysis.

cybersecurity_focus: Vulnerability analysis (SQLi ,XSS, IDOR, business logic flaws)

current_focus: Actively pursuing bug bounty hunting to further enhance my skills and expertise in identifying and responsibly disclosing vulnerabilities.
